title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 702.6 - Confidentiality
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 702.6 - Confidentiality

State Regulations

The Justice Center shall promulgate policies and procedures
regarding corrective actions or penalties for failure to comply with the use, confidentiality and non-disclosure requirements of Sections 89, 94, 95, 96 and
96-a of the Public Officer's Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
702.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
